Elements Voice Series vol.3 Aya Hisakawa - Forest Sways

name: Elements Voice Series vol.3 Aya Hisakawa - Forest Sways
summary: Elements Voice Series vol.3: Aya Hisakawa - Forest Sways (エレメントボイスシリーズ(3) 久川 綾 〜Forest Sways〜) is a CD-ROM-based title for the Playdia console, featuring full motion video of Japanese pop idol Aya Hisakawa (久川 綾).
